name: SHOTGUN (Dr. Wuro Industries)
description:
SHOTGUN is a fast-paced action game for your Commodore C64/C128 which can be played by up to 4 players!

Collect a gun, then shoot the others, without letting them kill you first!

This game supports the "Classical Games 4-Player Interface", which you can buy online for little money, or you can even build one by yourself. More information about this device can be found here.

You can choose whatever price you would like to pay for the game, even $0.00! If you're more into physical stuff however, you can check out the "Boxed Version" on shotgun.drwuro.com

Note: This is a game for the Commodore C64 home computer. If you have no C64 or if you have no possibility to transfer .PRG or .D64 files to a real C64, you can use an Emulator like VICE to play it on your PC/Mac or similar (VICE actually supports 4 joysticks, btw).

Another Note: There will be a real Windows and Linux version soon, and possibly a Mac version too!
